Package cdx.opencdx.client.service

Interface OpenCDXCommunicationClient

All Known Implementing Classes:
OpenCDXCommunicationClientImpl
public interface OpenCDXCommunicationClient
Interface for the Open CDX Communication Client.

  • Method Details

    • createEmailTemplate

      cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.EmailTemplate createEmailTemplate(cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.EmailTemplate emailTemplate, OpenCDXCallCredentials openCDXCallCredentials) throws OpenCDXClientException
      Create an Email Template
      Parameters:
      emailTemplate - EmailTemplate to create.
      openCDXCallCredentials - Call Credentials to use for send.
      Returns:
      the created EmailTemplate.
      Throws:
      OpenCDXClientException - Failed to convert to JSON

    • getEmailTemplate

      cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.EmailTemplate getEmailTemplate(cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.TemplateRequest templateRequest, OpenCDXCallCredentials openCDXCallCredentials) throws OpenCDXClientException
      Retrieve an Email Template
      Parameters:
      templateRequest - Request ID of email template to retrieve.
      openCDXCallCredentials - Call Credentials to use for send.
      Returns:
      the requested EmailTemplate.
      Throws:
      OpenCDXClientException - Template with requested ID not found.

    • updateEmailTemplate

      cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.EmailTemplate updateEmailTemplate(cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.EmailTemplate emailTemplate, OpenCDXCallCredentials openCDXCallCredentials) throws OpenCDXClientException
      Update an Email Template
      Parameters:
      emailTemplate - Updated EmailTemplate.
      openCDXCallCredentials - Call Credentials to use for send.
      Returns:
      updated EmailTemplate.
      Throws:
      OpenCDXClientException - OpenCDXFailedPrecondition Missing template id.
      OpenCDXClientException - OpenCDXNotAcceptable Failed to convert to JSON

      SuccessResponse indicating if the action was successful.

    • sendNotification

      cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.SuccessResponse sendNotification(cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.Notification notification, OpenCDXCallCredentials openCDXCallCredentials) throws OpenCDXClientException
      Send Notification
      Parameters:
      notification - Notification information to trigger.
      openCDXCallCredentials - Call Credentials to use for send.
      Returns:
      SuccessResponse indicating if the action was successful.
      Throws:
      OpenCDXClientException - OpenCDXNotFound Template not found
      OpenCDXClientException - OpenCDXFailedPrecondition Missing variable from data for substitution.
      OpenCDXClientException - OpenCDXNotAcceptable Failed to convert to JSON

    • listSMSTemplates

      cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.SMSTemplateListResponse listSMSTemplates(cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.SMSTemplateListRequest request, OpenCDXCallCredentials openCDXCallCredentials)
      List of all SMSTemplates
      Parameters:
      request - Request indicating pagination, sorting, and page size.
      openCDXCallCredentials - Call Credentials to use for send.
      Returns:
      requested SMSTemplates with page, sorting, and page size
